channel.title: Skillcape Help [pi]
channel.description: I know in a PI server the old wise man gives you the skillcape when you get to 99 but i wana make it more releatic like if you get 99 Firemaking you go talk to the Firemaking Master to get the cape? how would i come to doing this. Also when you put the skill capes in the case even tho u say you need to be 99 you can still wear it at level 1

item.title: Skillcape Help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

So the process you would need to go through is this:

[ul][li]When the player clicks the Npc[/li]
[li]Check their current level for the skill[/li]
[li]If the skill is 99, then allow the player to buy their cape[/li]
[li]If not, tell the player.[/li][/ul]

As for allowing players to wear it at level 1, if you make the items untradeable then no player without level 99 should have it.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape Help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:431579”][quote author=JCor9 link=topic=534257.msg3906026#msg3906026 date=1328231867]
I know in a PI server the old wise man gives you the skillcape when you get to 99 but i wana make it more releatic like if you get 99 Firemaking you go talk to the Firemaking Master to get the cape? how would i come to doing this. Also when you put the skill capes in the case even tho u say you need to be 99 you can still wear it at level 1
[/quote]

No iv been trying to make it so that it doesnt work at level one

Why would you want to be able to wear them at level 1? The kind of defeats the purpose.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape Help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-land Chaotic-land
item.description:
@Chaotic-land wrote:

Add this to your Itemassistiant.java

[code]case 9747:

		c.attackLevelReq = 99;
		break;		[/code]

now you made attack cape 99 attack to wear.

Read full topic
